{{Wireless embedded system |brand=HooToo |model=TripMate |revision=Nano (HT-TM02) |asin=B00HZWOQZ6;GB;,B00HZWOQZ6 |price=40 |est_release_date=06/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=travel router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350F |cpu1_cspeed=360 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=KH25L6406E |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6TG |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;3.6.0.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt (unofficially) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TripMateNano-ODB4 |default_ip=10.10.10.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:1C:C2 |oui_eth=00:1C:C2 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Travel Router}} :[https://www.hootoo.com/p/wireless-travel-router Product page]
*[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/hootoo/tripmate-nano ''HooToo TripMate'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
===Models=== *[[HooToo TripMate]] (HT-TM01) • [[Ralink]] RT5350F @360MHz 8/32MB *[[HooToo TripMate Nano]] (HT-TM02) • [[Ralink]] RT5350F @360MHz 8/32MB • [https://www.hootoo.com/p/wireless-travel-router PPage]<!-- :HooToo Wireless Travel Router, USB Port, High Perf • TripMate Nano • [https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00HZWOQZ6 B00HZWOQZ6] --> *[[HooToo TripMate Mini]] (HT-TM03) • [[Ralink]] RT5350F @360MHz 8/32MB *[[HooToo TripMate Elite]] (HT-TM04) • [[Ralink]] RT5350F @360MHz 8/32MB *[[HooToo TripMate Titan]] (HT-TM05) • [[MediaTek]] MT7620N @580MHz 8/64MB • [https://www.hootoo.com/p/filehub PPage] <!-- :HooToo Filehub, Wireless Travel Router, iPhone iPad Portable SSD Hard Drive Reader, Photo Backup Device, :10400mAh External Battery Pack Travel Charger • TripMate Titan • [https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B074LHG47K B074LHG47K] --> *[[HooToo TripMate Elite U]] (HT-TM06) • [[MediaTek]] MT7620N @580MHz 8/32MB
